```{r}
library(tidyverse)
# Date Manipulation
library(lubridate)
# Metrics
library(MLmetrics)
# Time Series Analysis
library(tseries)
library(forecast)
library(TSstudio)
```

```{r}

data <- read.csv("../../data/Corona_Curves_TX_NY_NJ_V2.csv")

data <- data %>%
  filter(State == 'TX')


```





```{r}
print(data)
```



```{r}
data$Pop_Pct_Log <- log(data$Pop_Pct)

train <- data %>%
  filter(Curve_Day <= 18)

test <- data %>%
  filter(Curve_Day > 18)
```



```{r}
tsdata <- ts(train$Pop_Pct_Log, frequency = 365 )
```



```{r}
tsdata2 <- ts(test$Pop_Pct_Log, frequency = 365 , start = c(1, 19))
```

